text: In a pan heat some oil and sauté the bhindi for 5-10 mins with some curd  Meanwhile Boil 1 cup of Toor dal with little turmeric and asefotida  Then, In a heavy bottomed pan heat oil. Add Mustard seeds, once they pop, add in Cumin, Curry leaves, a  pinch of Asefotida, and crushed Garlic and sauté for a few seconds The add the Onion, Tomato, and sprinkle some salt. Sprinkling salt helps the tomato cook faster. You May also add tomato puree Once the raw smell of Onion goes, add Chili powder,  Zeera Methi powder (See Tips) and a little Turmeric powder  Then add the fried Okra  Now, Put in a glass of water. Then add Tamarind juice and the Cooked Dal/Lentil. Adjust salt according to taste Simmer it for 5-10 minutes  Garnish with coriander leaves & Serve! The Sambhar can be eaten with Rice, Roti, Idli or dosa
